RelatedSentence: AT&T Digital Life Gives Consumers Control to Secure and Manage their Homes from Virtually Anywhere .

DALLAS , May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire / --   AT&T * today announced that on Friday , May 23 it will launch Digital Life in Omaha , along with five other markets : Beaumont , Texas , Toledo , Ohio , Greenville , South Carolina , Cape Coral , Florida and Oxnard , California .
